**Hi!**

I've got some problems with design in the theme typewriter.
I just want to create a simple parser game.
In the desktop version everything's fine.
The command bar looks good and the game works well.

If I start the game on my mobile, there appears a "plus"-button ("More") besides the command bar.

**Is it possible to hide this button?**

I like to use the parser game style for an exit game - played on mobile.
So, if the players push the "plus"-button, they can restart or end the game.
And that's not soooo good.... :(

***Thanks for helping!***
